title: Food & Drink
meta_title: Food & Drink | Blog | Aston Waikiki Beach Hotel
meta_description: The Honolulu food and drink scene is just as dynamic as it is colorful. Know where to look for island favorites such as poke, spam musubi, bento boxes and cocktails across Waikiki when you read about Hawai’i food and drink here on the blog.
